text: khe r mea d n chea khe del a l laoh ban banhchouh kompir kuor an daembi nenam dl mnoussaalok ning bangheanh pi meakra del troemotrauv promteang vinichchhy rveang khosa ning trauv . hetonih anaknea haey knong chamnaom puok anak mean v td mean nowknong khe nih chaur aoy ke buosa . haey anaknea mean chomngu ryy thveudamnaer( ach phaak buosa ban) te trauv buosa sang vinh now thngai phe sa ng( chamnuon thngai del ban phaak noh) . a l laoh chngaoy puok anak ngeayosruol haey a l laoh min chngaoy puok anak lombak noh te . haey chaur puok anakbuosa bangkrob chamnuon( thngai nei khe r mea d n) . haey chaur puok anak leukatamkeung a l laoh( toek hpie r now thngai r yea hve t raoh) champoh avei del trong ban changaoulobangheanh haey sangkhumtha puok anak thleng amnarkoun
